job.title: Frontend Developer
job.description: <p>ShortList Recruitment are working with a Nationwide Real Estate company in the Austin area who are looking to bring in a Software Engineer to help their continued growth. This developer would get the ability to enhance their current platform by adapting existing features and creating new ones to solve technical issues. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Tasks </p><ul><li>Work effectively with a team of 8 other Backend/Frontend Developers and QA's to build an amazing software product</li><li>Build software primarily using ReactJS (or Angular)</li><li>Work and communicate effectively in a team environment</li><li>Thoughtful in code reviews with the ability to contribute and the desire to learn</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Desired Skills and Experience </p><ul><li>5+ years of software development experience</li><li>Experience with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and object-oriented programming languages </li><li>Experience with ReactJS, or AngularJS is required </li><li>Experience with RESTful APIs</li><li>Experience with Unit Testing is a plus</li><li>Experience with Azure Cloud is a plus </li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>This position would be paying a Competitive Salary plus a fantastic benefits package. The ideal candidate is located in Austin, TX.</p>
